main event: An observer driving in Farmingdale, Long Island, reported seeing four reddish objects in a 'V' formation on 15 March 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 10 seconds,The observer saw the objects with unaided eye,The objects flew in a southerly direction, The exact manner of disappearance of the objects was unknown, The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: four reddish objects in a 'V' formation
